Name: Kyma Maker's Island
About the game: You're looking for your missing mother. Replace her by helping the mayor while looking for clues by discovering various technologies and strange places... Look for clues to find where your mother is and find secret places Explore and mine to craft buildings, furnitures and better tools Discover new crafts through the story Learn new crafts at the Training Center Create electrical circuits with logic gates Program your robot and make your own 3d prints Make various objects and constructions, shop and contribute to the city Design and improve your home Color furniture, clothing and lighting by adding up the dyes to have an infinity of colors Create a friendship with the villagers, or even more. Each villager has his own personality, which can evolve according to what you do / say Cook or go to the Gronks restaurant, and get bonuses when you eat varied Help villagers to get trust and unlock new crafts Meet special characters Take part in special events of the city Discover the different endings of special events Your mother's research will lead you to discover special and unexplored places
Meta Title: Kyma Maker's Island: Mar 25, 2021, Kidness and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Kyma Maker's Island? Check out the release date (Mar 25, 2021), developer insights from Kidness, and a complete game summary.
